description: This file provides a debounce utility function that creates a debounced version of a given function, delaying its execution until after a specified wait time.

methods.name: export function debounce<T extends (...args: any[]) => void>(fn: T, wait = 250) { debounce
methods.description: Creates a debounced version of the provided function that delays its execution until after the specified wait time.

ctags.name: debounce
ctags.pattern: /^export function debounce<T extends (...args: any[]) => void>(fn: T, wait = 250) {$/
